content: Second quarter adjusted EBITDA increased 61.7% to $242.3 million, and our adjusted EBITDA margin was 19.0%, a 100-basis point improvement compared to last year. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. And then just looking how the DI acquisition is performing, I mean, we're really happy with the EBITDA margins, the improvement we've seen in the business that's coming from all the buckets that Rob talked about, and just generally operational improvements happening in the DI side of the business.
